SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.doctor

Class PendingRequestView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.doctor.PendingRequestView
public class PendingRequestView extends View
The PendingRequestView class provides the user interface for displaying and managing pending appointment requests. It allows the doctor to view, confirm, or cancel pending appointments.

    • PendingRequestView

      public PendingRequestView()

  • Method Details

    • displayPendingAppointments

      public void displayPendingAppointments(Doctor doctor, PatientRepository patientRepository)
      Displays a list of pending appointments for the given doctor. The list shows details such as date, time, status, and the patient's name.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose pending appointments are being displayed.
      patientRepository - the repository that provides access to patient information.

    • displayOptions

      public int displayOptions()
      Displays the options for confirming or canceling a pending appointment.
      Returns:
      the option selected by the doctor (1 for confirm, 2 for cancel), or -1 if invalid input is provided.

    • displayAppointmentPrompt

      public int displayAppointmentPrompt(int size)
      Prompts the doctor to select an appointment index from the list of pending appointments.
      Parameters:
      size - the number of pending appointments in the list.
      Returns:
      the selected appointment index (adjusted to zero-based), or -1 if invalid input is provided.

    • displayNoPending

      public void displayNoPending()
      Displays a message indicating that there are no pending appointment requests.

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the pending requests view.
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View
